channel.title: MYB
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MYB, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: How Kalshi’s Cofounder Went From Professional Ballerina To World’s Youngest Self-Made Woman Billionaire
item.description: A former ballerina and MIT computer science grad, 29-year-old Brazilian Luana Lopes Lara is now the world’s youngest self-made woman billionaire.

item.title: Reagan And Koop Confronted AIDS. Trump And RFK Jr Ignore It
item.description: December 1 was World AIDS Day. For the first time since this global event was established in 1988, the United States government declined to observe it...

item.title: Apple Silicon: Key Execs Reveal How The Mac And iPad Were Revitalized
item.description: The M1 chip transformed the Mac when it launched five years ago. Two key Apple execs talk about how it happened, what it means, and how dark silicon c...

item.title: Here’s Where Drivers Suffer The Worst Traffic Congestion, Data Shows
item.description: Commuters in several of the nation’s metro areas now endure some of the most crowded highways on the planet.

item.title: FBI Warns Gmail And Outlook Users—Do Not Click On These Emails
item.description: Hackers are stealing millions of dollars — do not become their next victim.

item.title: Mediocre means average
